newsitem.title: THAILAND: Thai March CPI up 4.5 pct yr/yr, up 0.5 pct mo/mo.
newsitem.headline: Thai March CPI up 4.5 pct yr/yr, up 0.5 pct mo/mo.

text.p: The Thai consumer price index (CPI) rose 4.5 percent year-on-year in March against 4.3 percent in February, the Commerce Ministry said on Tuesday.
The ministry said the 1990-based index rose to 138.0 in March from its 132.0 level in the same month a year ago.
The Thai wholesale price index (WPI) rose 1.1 percent year-on-year in March against a 1.8 percent increase in the previous month, the ministry added.
It said wholesale prices rose 0.1 percent in March from February against a 0.5 percent month-on-month decline in the previous month.
The 1985-based index rose to 155.3 in March from its 153.6 level in March 1996, it said.
